text.section: The commissioner, before revoking any license shall set the matter down for a hearing to be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.
No person shall blast once his license has been revoked by the department.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 333, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 101, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 143, sec. 9.
